name: Telephone Number Validation
description: Matches with county code+11 2 2222 1234  with no country code(11) 1234 1234For a mobile number the formats (10 digits excluding country code with country code:+01 111 123 123Without country code:0123 123 123Other phone number formats are for toll free numbers  (13 numbers and 1300/1800)Regards,Harinder
author: Harinder Singh
